Articles.Content:
This is a challenge that will challenge the most advanced users.

The objective is to land on every celestial body in one mission. You can only use stock and Kethane parts. You can't use the debug mode or hyperedit or any other cheat thing you can get.

You can also set up refueling stations along the way.

Pics required:

Takeoff

Orbit around Kerbin

Kerbal Selfie on every celestial body.

Re-Entry Kerbin

Landing Kerbin

If you can do this, you will win not 1, but 17 gold stars!

Have Fun!
You could easily do this, given enough time. Kraken drives, you see.
Seems ok for a challenge, but can't we use other mods to make it look better? Such as visual enhancements, fustek station parts or the crew/ship manifest mods?

You could easily do this, given enough time. Kraken drives, you see.

Wouldn't that be included in the "any other cheat thing you can get"?

Is MJ allowed? Not that I will join in, but the question should be asked. IMHO it gives an unfair advantage over non-MJ contestants.

Also, may we see your entry, OP?

Alright! There are some changes to this challenge! You may use MJ if you want to do easy mode. I will post my entry ASAP, I just need to do it first. BTW you don't have to land on Jool, Kerbin, or the sun.
